TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveProjectBase

summary.span: 确定非 MSBuild 项目引用的输出文件。

span.span: Determines the output files for non-MSBuild project references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput`任务搜索设置的特殊属性[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]IDE 项目 Guid 和其关联的输出的列表。The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs. IDE 只能解决预非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]项目并以这种方式分隔[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]项目引用与非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]引用。The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references. IDE 返回的列表[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]作为 UnresolvedProjectReferences 的项目。The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences. 这可让任务使用功能更强大[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]机制来操作只需[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]项目引用，例如。This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as. 调用到特定目标的引用，以便获取清单文件名称，这将不可行的混合列表[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]和非-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]项目引用。calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.

returns.span: 如果任务成功执行，则为 ；否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreresolvedProjectOutputs { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含解析的项目输出的 XML 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.

value.span: 包含解析的项目输出的 XML 字符串。

span.span: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ ResolvedOutputPaths { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置保留原始项目引用特性的已解析引用路径。

span.span: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

value.span: 保留原始项目引用特性的已解析引用路径。

span.span: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ UnresolvedProjectReferences { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 格式的项目引用项。

span.span: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]只预解析非[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]项目中，无法使用输出的预解析的列表进行解析的项目引用项位于[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]格式。Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
